title: The Latest on the Coronavirus Vaccine
author: SBG-TV
description: As the world prepares for a new wave of coronavirus spikes, people across the nation wonder when a vaccine will be made available to the public. Over the last several months, researchers nation-wide have been working hard to develop a vaccine. One potential candidate, a vaccine called mRNA-1273, is being co-developed by researchers at NIH's National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) and the biotech company Moderna, Inc.
